confidentialInformation.description: The secret formula for Acme Corporation's new product.
The customer list of XYZ Company.

purpose: To protect the confidential information of both parties during the course of their business relationship.
termination: Either party may terminate this NDA by providing written notice to the other party at least thirty (30) days prior to the effective date of termination.
governingLaw: The laws of the State of California
disputes: Any disputes arising out of or relating to this NDA shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association.
